# stripMargin

> A help for strip string's margin like scala


## examples

```javascript
var s = require('stripmargin');

s.stripMargin(
    `Title
    |  Head
    |  Body
    Foot`
);

/*
Title
  Head
  Body
Foot
*/

//use stripMargin.inject() to inject String.prototype,re-call will revert the injection 

s.inject();

    `Titile
    |  Head
    |  BODY
    FOOT`.stripMargin();

s.inject();//revert
```
